invest.title: Investment Opportunities
invest.subtitle: Investor Value Proposition
invest.description: Join us in shaping the digital future through strategic investments in innovation.

feature1.title: Digital University Investment
feature1.description: Access to an exclusive ecosystem combining academic innovation with entrepreneurial expertise.

feature2.title: CloudHouse Concept
feature2.description: Modern innovation hub promoting startups and serving as a platform for data management.

feature3.title: Academic Excellence
feature3.description: Access to a network of renowned professors and researchers in digital science.

feature4.title: Growth Potential
feature4.description: Strategic position in the growing digital education and innovation market.

option1.title: Company Shares
option1.description: Financial participation in the development and success of the German UDS organization. This participation opens up the right to have a say in strategic decisions and active involvement.

option2.title: Innovation Projects
option2.description: Support groundbreaking research and development projects in digital education and technology. Benefit from the university's expertise and network.

heroSection.title: German UDS Innovation GmbH: Digital Innovation Ecosystem
heroSection.subtitle: Our integrated ecosystem connects academic excellence with entrepreneurial practice through strategic investments and services.
heroSection.quote: Transforming university research into marketable digital products and business models through our vertical participation structure.

investCommercial.title: Our Investment Portfolio

stakeholders.service: 100% stake in German UDS Service GmbH – responsible for the IT infrastructure for the university and external partners
stakeholders.cloudhouse: 20% stake in FB Cloudhouse GmbH – handles administrative tasks and space rental
stakeholders.university: 20% participation in German UDS gGmbH – guarantees creative involvement in the university

investCommercial.uspDescription: Our vertical structure directly involves professors and research centers in newly founded verticals. This transforms university research into marketable digital products and business models.
investCommercial.keyPeopleDescription: These professors and experts lead verticals and research initiatives at German UDS, bridging academia with digital innovation.

footer.description: Our integrated ecosystem connects academic excellence with entrepreneurial practice through strategic investments and services.
footer.stayUpdated: Stay updated with our latest investment opportunities and innovations.

business.subtitle: Our Approach
business.description: Our core business combines strategic investments with consulting services and innovation utilization.

card1.title: 1. Investments
card1.description: Strategic development of companies in collaboration with the German University of Digital Science

card2.title: 2. Consulting and Services
card2.description: IT, Marketing, Sales, Personnel and Project Development

card3.title: 3. Innovation
card3.description: Research to market transfer, Open source

card4.title: 4. Planned Vertical Shareholding
card4.description: Professor and Research Center involvement structure

point1.title: Investment Requirements
point1.description: Initial phase: Build administrative infrastructure. Further development: Finance new investments and verticals.

point2.title: Income Sources
point2.description: Dividends from investments. Consulting fees. Government grants for innovation projects.

point3.title: Risk Management
point3.description: Diversified portfolio across technology sectors. Transparent reporting to investors.

contact.title: Interested in Investing?

contact.description: Contact us to learn more about German UDS Innovation GmbH and discover how you can be part of our digital innovation ecosystem.

innovation.title: Digital Innovator
innovation.description: As a catalyst, German UDS Innovation GmbH promotes sustainable technology transfer between science and industry and achieves attractive returns on investment.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Promote innovation through targeted participation. Create value for investors. Connect German University of Digital Science and business through integration.

imprint.metaDescription: Legal information about German UDS Innovation GmbH, including contact details and company registration information.

imprint.companyInfoText:
German UDS Innovation GmbH
Innovation Campus
Marlene-Dietrich-Allee 14
14482 Potsdam
Germany
imprint.management: Prof. Dr. Mike Friedrichsen & Prof. Dr. Christoph Meinel
imprint.responsibilityText: The content of this website has been prepared with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws (§ 7 Abs.1 TMG). However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obligated to monitor third-party information transmitted or stored or to investigate circumstances that indicate unlawful activity.
imprint.disputeResolutionText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS) at https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/. We are neither obligated nor willing to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
imprint.copyright: All texts, images, and other content published on this website are protected by German copyright law. Reproduction, distribution, or public reproduction is only permitted with prior written consent.
imprint.externalLinksDisclaimer: We are not responsible for the content of external websites linked to ours. At the time of linking, no illegal content was detected. Responsibility for the content of linked pages lies solely with their operators. If we become aware of any legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
imprint.mediaCredits: All images and media used on this site were created by our team and are fully licensed.
imprint.designCredits: Design & Realization: German UDS Innovation Team

privacy.metaDescription: Information about how German UDS Innovation GmbH collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: German UDS Innovation GmbH ('we', 'us', or 'our') respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, process, and use personal information when you visit our website or interact with us. We comply with the requirements of the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG).

dataController.title: Controller and Contact Information
dataController.content:
German UDS Innovation GmbH 
Marlene-Dietrich-Allee 14, 
14482 Potsdam, Germany 
Email: privacy@innovation.german-uds.de

dataCollection.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect both personal and technical information when you interact with our website.

categories.title: This includes, but is not limited to:
categories.item1: Personal data (such as name, email address, and phone number) that you voluntarily provide when contacting us
categories.item2: IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URL, pages visited, and date/time of access
categories.item3: Device information such as type, model, and mobile network
categories.item4: Location data, if explicitly enabled by the user

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.content: We are hosting the website on GitHub Pages. GitHub Inc. may process technical data such as IP addresses and browser metadata in accordance with their own privacy policies. For more information, visit: https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/privacy-policies/github-privacy-statement

cookies.title: Cookies and Web Beacons
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to ensure website functionality, collect analytics, and enhance your user experience. These include session cookies, persistent cookies, and third-party cookies. You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect parts of the website.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
dataUse.item1: To operate and maintain our website
dataUse.item2: To respond to your questions and inquiries
dataUse.item3: To send important notices, updates, and administrative messages
dataUse.item4: To ensure security and prevent misuse

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your data in accordance with Art. 6 of the GDPR: (a) with your consent, (b) to perform a contract, (c) to comply with legal obligations, or (f) for our legitimate interests. You may withdraw your consent at any time.

dataSharing.title: Sharing of Your Information
dataSharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your data with trusted service providers (e.g., web hosting, analytics) who process it under our instructions. Data may also be shared if required by law or necessary to protect legal interests.

dataRetention.title: Retention and Deletion of Data
dataRetention.content: We retain personal data only for as long as necessary for the stated purposes or legal obligations. Data will be securely deleted or anonymized when no longer required.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: As a data subject under the GDPR, you have the right to:
rights.item2: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
rights.item3: Request deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten')
rights.item5: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
rights.item6: Receive your data in a portable format
rights.item7: Withdraw consent at any time, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on prior consent

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures, including SSL encryption (HTTPS), to protect your personal data from unauthorized access or misuse.

analytics.title: Analytics and Tracking
analytics.content: We may use Google Analytics to collect aggregated statistics about website usage. Data may be transferred outside the EU under Standard Contractual Clauses. You can opt out using browser settings or the Google Analytics opt-out add-on.

authority.title: Supervisory Authority
authority.content: You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority. In Germany, a list of authorities is available at www.bfdi.bund.de.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in legal, technical, or business developments. The updated policy will be published on this page and becomes effective immediately upon posting.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: As a catalyst, German UDS Innovation GmbH promotes sustainable technology transfer between science and industry and achieves attractive returns on investment. Our ecosystem connects academic excellence with entrepreneurial practice.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Establish a successful investment company in digital innovations. Act as a catalyst for technology transfer between science and industry.

foundation.title: The Foundation
foundation.subtitle: Nonprofit Support
foundation.description: Our foundation supports digital education and research.

why.title: Why the German UDS Foundation Exists
points: Promotes and finances German University of Digital Science
Shapes digital civil society
Integrates digital science into research and society
Pioneers innovative digitalization strategies

guiding.title: Guiding Principles
points: Shape the digital future
Establish Digital Science as an innovative research approach
Promote young talent in digital fields
Support development of future-oriented educational skills

purpose.title: Purpose of the Foundation
points: Support German UDS in development and operation
Promote global cooperation in education and research
Fund visionary projects like the Virtual Campus
Boost open digital platforms like German-UDS.Academy

support.title: How You Can Support Us
points: Donations
Endowments
Contributions
Project-specific funding (with tax benefits)

coreBeliefs.title: Our Core Beliefs
coreBeliefs.description: We believe in the power of education and innovation to drive positive societal change.

mission.title: Foundation Goals
mission.description: The foundation promotes education, research, and innovation in the digital domain.

headline.title: Future-Focused Learning, Today.
headline.description: Discover how UDS empowers students to lead in a rapidly evolving digital world.

university.title: German University of Digital Science
university.subtitle: Future Education Model
university.description: Our innovative approach to higher education in the digital age.

empowering.title: Empowering Global Talents
empowering.description: We empower learners with access to global knowledge and mentorship.

degrees.title: World-Class University Degrees
degrees.description: Internationally recognized digital degrees that stand out.

learning.title: Efficient Lifelong Learning
learning.description: Learn at your pace with flexible, career-aligned programs.

micro.title: Micro Degree Programs
micro.description: Specialized micro-programs for emerging tech domains.

transforming.title: Transforming Higher Education
points: Higher education lags behind other industries in technological adoption.
Online education market is projected to reach $1 trillion by 2027.
Synchronous and asynchronous learning formats are increasingly preferred.
Personalized, competency-based learning is essential for future readiness.

ecosystem.title: The Learning Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: The German UDS supports diverse learners through formal and informal formats, including online, blended, and in-person options — all aligned with the Common Micro Credential Framework.
points: Compatible with the European MOOC Consortium (EMC-CMF)
Designed for lifelong learners and professionals
Supports modular micro-credentials across disciplines

journey.title: Student Journey with UDS
journey.description: From initial contact to campus management and evaluation, German UDS streamlines digital learning through LMS, LTI integration, proctoring, and modular degrees.

cloudhouse.title: The CloudHouse: Our Innovation Hub
cloudhouse.description: Located in Media City Babelsberg, CloudHouse is a high-tech campus featuring labs, a data center, and state-of-the-art event spaces designed for collaboration and hybrid learning.
cloudhouse.additional: It represents our commitment to creating an ecosystem that fosters innovation, community, and next-generation education.

model.title: Higher Education Model
model.description: A future-oriented education model combining academic excellence with practical application.

overview.title: German University of Digital Science:
pointsCondensed: State-recognized and fully accredited Master's and MBA programs.
Digital-first education: virtual classrooms and real-time collaboration.
Affordable, English-medium learning from anywhere in the world.
Driving innovation for Germany’s digital economy through flexible study formats.
